name: Ghost Game (Team Gaivot)
description:
Story:

In this game you play as a ghost. You have recently been murdered, and are having a really hard time figuring out what happened and even who you were. Something has attracted you to a particular apartment building though, to a particular character, Richard. You approach him and, but maybe it was too much, now you see yourself through the eyes of Richard.

Game:

Welcome to Ghost Game, in this game you play the role of a ghost possessing certain individuals while trying to learn more about your own past and what led you to your demise. 

Controls:

- You can move forwards or backwards by pressing the respective keys (Default: W and S). 
- Press the turn keys to make Richard face different directions (Default: A and D). 
- Inspect items in the apartment with the interact key (Default: Spacebar). 
While exploring your host may try to fight your commands, if that happens you might feel like you are losing some control over them. You can regain control by completing puzzles or minigames.
